monitoring_tools: Firebase Performance Monitoring; Google Cloud Monitoring
improvement_opportunities: Optimize Firestore queries; increase function memory.
business_relevance: Direct impact on application responsiveness and user experience.

measurement_conditions: From app launch to first interactive screen on a mid-range device (e.g., Pixel 5).
improvement_opportunities: Reduce initial asset loading; lazy-load modules.
business_relevance: First impression of the app's quality and responsiveness.

measurement_conditions: During critical animations and list scrolling.
improvement_opportunities: Optimize widget build methods; reduce re-renders.
business_relevance: Ensures a smooth, non-janky user experience.
